title: For some with bipolar disorder, manic episodes are magnified for all to see online
description: Social media platforms have created new complications for people with bipolar disorder when evidence of their manic episodes shows up online.
content: Social media platforms have created new complications for people with bipolar disorder when evidence of their manic episodes shows up online.
